mapper.select: SELECT BRAND_ID, BRAND_NM, ORCO_BRAND_YN, IF(ORCO_BRAND_YN = 'Y', "자사","경쟁사") ORCO_BRAND_NM, SORT_ORD, USE_YN FROM T_BRAND_M
SELECT BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_NM, LIQ_KD_CD, STCASE_CD, SORT_ORD, USE_YN FROM T_SUB_BRAND_M WHERE BRAND_ID = #{masterBrandId}
SELECT COALESCE(count(brand_id),0) CNT FROM T_BRAND_M WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId}
SELECT BRAND_ID, BRAND_NM, ORCO_BRAND_YN, IF(ORCO_BRAND_YN = 'Y', "자사","경쟁사") ORCO_BRAND_NM, SORT_ORD, USE_YN FROM T_BRAND_M WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId}
mapper.update: UPDATE T_BRAND_M SET BRAND_NM = #{brandNm}, ORCO_BRAND_YN = #{orcoBrandYn}, SORT_ORD = #{sortOrd}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, DATA_UPD_DTM = NOW(), DATA_UPD_ID = '1' WHERE BRAND_ID = #{brandId}

INSERT INTO T_BRAND_M (BRAND_ID, BRAND_NM, ORCO_BRAND_YN, SORT_ORD, USE_YN, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES ( #{brandId}, #{brandNm}, #{orcoBrandYn}, #{sortOrd}, #{useYn}, now(), '0', now(), '0')

UPDATE T_SUB_BRAND_M SET SUB_BRAND_NM = #{subBrandNm}, LIQ_KD_CD = #{liqKdCd}, STCASE_CD = #{stcaseCd}, SORT_ORD = #{subSortOrd}, USE_YN = #{subUseYn}, DATA_UPD_DTM = NOW(), DATA_UPD_ID = '1' WHERE BRAND_ID = #{masterBrandId} AND SUB_BRAND_ID = #{subBrandId}

INSERT INTO T_SUB_BRAND_M (BRAND_ID, SUB_BRAND_ID,SUB_BRAND_NM, LIQ_KD_CD, STCASE_CD, SORT_ORD, USE_YN, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES ( #{masterBrandId},#{subBrandId}, #{subBrandNm}, #{liqKdCd}, #{stcaseCd}, #{subSortOrd}, #{subUseYn}, now(), '0', now(), '0')
